title: Ticket #7492: Kerberos authentication fails to set remote domain
description:
https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/99

Kerberos authentication fails to set the remote domain unless verbose debugging is on for D_SECURITY.

The cause is that the call to setRemoteDomain() in Condor_Auth_Kerberos::map_domain_name() is inside the condition if (IsDebugVerbose(D_SECURITY)).
